name: Portal Wars (lootss)
description:
Controls

  • Left click: create green portal
  • Right click: create blue portal
  • Space: pause
  • R: restart current level

Use portals to redirect enemies and projectiles to protect your base. Get rid of all enemies to finish the level.

Entry for Lowrez Jam 2021.

Additionnal info

  • Made with Godot Engine
  • Art made with Aseprite
  • Color palette by DawnBringer
  • Sound effect made with jsfxr
  • Font: Kongtext
